name: Destination (MAGES Institute of Excellence)
description:
Using only your text, navigate through a surrealistic world of nightmarish horror in order to find enough money to pay off your fare and stay on the bus. As the minutes tick down, you will need to use out-of-the-box thinking in order to reach your final destination.

MAGES Institute of Excellence

This game was developed over a 6-week period by DGDT Student Stephanie Kek as part of the Basic Game Programming Module.

Asset Credits:

Artwork by Stephanie Kek
